entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 12:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
